programme.title: Becoming Barack: Finding Hope
programme.desc: The untold story of Barack Obama, from his early pre-political years in community building to becoming the 44th President of the United States.

programme.title: Partners of the Heart
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of segregation, Vivien Thomas, a black carpenter with a genius for surgery, and Dr. Alfred Blalock, a renowned white surgeon, dared to defy medical gospel by forging a partnership that changed the course of medical history.

programme.title: Happiness Is a Four Letter Word
programme.desc: A heart-warming romance that explores the lives of three best friends – Nandi, Zaza, and Princess - living the good life in the vibrant city of Johannesburg.

programme.title: JK's House
programme.desc: At JK’s House, Dr. Amber Jenkins (Robin Givens) and JK blend family values and life lessons with music and dance.

programme.title: Gone Too Far
programme.desc: Follow two estranged teenage brothers over the course of a single day as they struggle to accept each other for who they are.

programme.title: An Anthem In Grey
programme.desc: On a troubled campus, a young man with a complicated past finds himself caught between desire and a strict political movement after vowing to uphold purity.

programme.title: The People's Games
programme.desc: The People's Games' second episode explores global sports like oil wrestling, hurling, Pega de Boi, and rowing.

programme.title: Shabu
programme.desc: Shabu, a 14-year-old artist from "The Paperclip," Rotterdam's tough hood, wrecks his grandma's car and must hustle to repay her by summer's end, using his music and wit to shine.

programme.title: Last Of The Mississippi Jukes
programme.desc: Explore the roots of blues in the fading juke joints of Mississippi, where local musicians at Subway Lounge and Ground Zero Blues Club, keep the century-old tradition alive.

programme.title: Yankee Hustle
programme.desc: A quick-witted dramedy showcasing the explosive and hilarious journey of three African immigrants as they navigate the treacherous waters of legal status, social awkwardness, romance, and challenging friendships while maintaining their cultural pride.

programme.title: Yankee Hustle
programme.desc: A quick-witted dramedy showcasing the explosive and hilarious journey of three African immigrants as they navigate the treacherous waters of legal status, social awkwardness, romance, and challenging friendships while maintaining their cultural pride.

programme.title: Finest Homes
programme.desc: South African home design and architecture has truly come into its own over the last decade. Bland imitations have made way for modern masterpieces and character-filled design.

programme.title: Pettytine's Day
programme.desc: Brandon was living the dream with a stunning spouse, a talented child, and a flourishing music empire as a producer, until his secret endeavors finally catch up with him.

programme.title: Simi
programme.desc: Who will she let in? How will they keep it a secret?

programme.title: On The Other Foot
programme.desc: London cabbie Billy, an outspoken racist, faces a crisis when his daughter dates a black man. In a bizarre twist, he wakes up in a black man's body, leading to a comical exploration of race and society.

programme.title: Falcon Rising
programme.desc: An ex-marine takes to Brazil's slums to battle the yakuza outfit that attacked his sister and left her for dead.

programme.title: Blue Lightning
programme.desc: An embittered elder's world takes a thrilling twist when he unravels a spirited orphan's true lineage, igniting their connection through the exhilarating realm of soap box derby racing.

programme.title: Mothers In Love
programme.desc: After a miscarriage, a loving couple must live under the same roof with both their mothers who can't stand each other.
